section.title: SenseSetRelation relation type
section.para: Represents an unordered set of two or more senses (typically - but not necessarily - belonging to two or more different entries). Recommended for encoding synonyms, near synonyms etc.

listitem.para: Can be constrained and mapped to external authorities by the DMLex Controlled Vocabularies Module.
Sense (two or more, all in the same LexicographicResource)
